# PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.hint

**Case**

Plays back only a brief section of the motion content of the Live Photo, without sound.

## Declaration

```swift
case hint
```

## Discussion

This style matches the effect seen in various iOS interface elements for hinting to the user when an asset contains Live Photo content.

## Constants

- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.undefined**: This value is invalid for use.
- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.full**: Plays back the entire motion and sound content of the Live Photo, including transition effects at the start and end.
